name: POWER PANIC
description:
Your spacecraft has been hit by a huge asteroid, and you have to control your ship with the only intact energy cell left! Frantically jump from one control terminal to another to steer your ship out of the way of asteroids, try to repair the hull and hold on until you exit on the other side of the asteroid field.

Made according to the theme "only one" for #GMTKjam 2019.
Team:

  • Jannik Boysen (Code, Art)
  • Lowis Schwahn (Code, Sound)
  • Jonna Greve / ZombieFerret (2D Art)
